item.title: You Won't Believe What These Lyrics From 'Your Arms Feel Like Home' Will Make You Feel!
item.description: Introduction A Overview of the Song “Your Arms Feel Like Home” “Your Arms Feel Like Home” is a song by the band Third Eye Blind The song is about the power of love and the comfort of being in the arms of someone you love It speaks of the joy of being with someone who makes you feel safe, secure, and loved B. Description of the Emotional Impact of the Lyrics
